<<<<<<< HEAD
The information of Francisco de Faria, delivered at the bar of the House of Commons, Munday the first day of November, in the year of our Lord, 1680 Faria, Francisco de, b. 1653.
[4], 12 p.
Printed by the assigns of John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ..., London : 1680.
"Perused and signed to be printed according to the order of the House of Commons, by me William Williams, speaker" Royal coat of arms on t.p. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
